zh.Status.util.585604-1: 诊断网络组件配置是否正确，配置错误将导致设备连接失败
zh.Status.util.585604-4: 诊断设备接入网关状态是否正常，禁用状态将导致连接失败
zh.Status.util.585604-6: 诊断产品状态是否正常，禁用状态将导致设备连接失败
zh.Status.util.585604-8: 诊断设备状态是否正常，禁用状态将导致设备连接失败
zh.Status.util.585604-9: 诊断设备接入网关状态是否正常，网关配置是否正确
zh.Status.util.585604-11: 诊断网关父设备状态是否正常，禁用或离线将导致连接失败

en.Status.util.585604-1: Diagnose whether the network component configuration is correct. Incorrect configuration will cause device connection failure
en.Status.util.585604-4: Diagnose whether the device's access gateway status is normal. Disabling the status will result in connection failure
en.Status.util.585604-6: Diagnose whether the product status is normal, disabling the status will cause device connection failure
en.Status.util.585604-8: Diagnose whether the device status is normal, disabling the status will cause device connection failure
en.Status.util.585604-9: Check if the diagnostic device is connected to the gateway and if the gateway configuration is correct
en.Status.util.585604-11: Diagnosing whether the parent device status of the gateway is normal, disabling or going offline will result in connection failure
